roleset.name: to make to convert to carbon
roleset.note: CARBONIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'carbonify' based on internet usage examples, expansion via VerbNet. VN 45.4. Comparison with 'solidify.' (from carbonify.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: We-1 need to reduce general consumption and to plant more trees to take carbon dioxide out of the air and turn it into plain old carbon - *-1 to carbonify C02!
